nodes.text: Harrandarr was a planet located in the Harrandarr system, a part of the Outer Rim Territories' Bosph sector. It was the homeworld of the sentient Buzchub species. Und'l, a Buzchub who worked for Galactic Empire sympathizers on the Expansion Region astronomical object Roldalna shortly after the establishment of the New Republic in 4 ABY, hailed from Harrandarr.

Harrandarr was first mentioned in "The Package," a Star Wars: The Roleplaying Game adventure written by Dave Marron and published by West End Games in the 1993 book Twin Stars of Kira. The 2009 reference book The Essential Atlas placed the Harrandarr system, and therefore the planet itself, in grid square Q-3.
